titleStmt.title: Loves extasie, or, Strephon and cloas corronation tho loves the only coyn in heaven doth go, happy those lovers are that pay below, to the tune of, Jenny gin, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon at the Angel in Guiltspur-Street,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
